response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure it at a competitive advantage. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction beneficial for both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
